name: Fastline
description:
Fastline is a fast-paced, minimalistic racing game where you compete against ghosts of other players. The Goal:

As in any racing game the goal is to be as fast as possible. There are 20 different levels to beat. The closer you stay on the track the faster you move and your boost will also charge faster. Leaving the track too far will be punished. And don't miss any checkpoints.

You need to be 1st, 2nd or 3rd place to unlock the next level.


The Ghosts:

Each time you start the a race, some random ghosts are loaded. They have different colors. Green ghosts are you, blue ones are other players. If you find a red ghost thats me, the developer of the game ;)

The Controls:

I recommend you play the game with a controller. You can play it with a keyboard, but.. ehm.. you know.. belive me.. use a controller :)

  • Left Stick:    Steer you ship
  • Right Trigger:  Accelerate
  • A: Booooost!

If you really wand or need to use a keyboard:

  • W:   Accellerate
  • A/D: Rotate ship
  • Left Shift: Booooost!

Get in touch:

If you like the game or have some issues or want to give me some feedback (which i would love to hear) get in touch with me:
